thread.title: FIREWORKS: Sen. Roberts just offered Sen. Wyden a valium at the Steven Mnuchin hearing
thread.title_full: FIREWORKS: Sen. Roberts just offered Sen. Wyden a valium at the Steven Mnuchin hearing

author: Greg P.
title: FIREWORKS: Sen. Roberts just offered Sen. Wyden a valium at the Steven Mnuchin hearing
text:
FIREWORKS: Sen. Roberts just offered Sen. Wyden a valium at the Steven Mnuchin hearing Posted at 10:59   Greg P.   
The next four years are going to be awesome if this is going to happen all the time. 
Republican Sen. Pat Roberts just offered a valium to Democrat Sen. Ron Wyden before his next round of questions for Treasury Secretary nominee Steven Mnuchin: Sen. Roberts during Treasury confirmation hearing offers Valium to fellow senator, says he's said it to POTUS, after criticism. Getting ugly 
— Nicole Rodriguez (@NicRodriguez) January 19, 2017 Sen. Roberts just told Sen. Wyden to take a valium and now the Senate Finance Committee is arguing over the horribly delivered joke 
— Kira Lerner (@kira_lerner) January 19, 2017 . @SenPatRoberts says @RonWyden should take a valium? Maybe more Senators should be outraged by Wall St bankers that steal people's homes. 
— Elizabeth Warren (@SenWarren) January 19, 2017 
Sen. Roberts then defended the joke: "A little pinprick of humor might not hurt this committee once in a while" to a prickly @RonWyden over a Valium joke
